Situated between Sagar and Jabalpur highway.  You can enter Damoh by train, between Sagour and Katni Station.

value: Bagdari waterfall and Shree Koni ji

temples are situated at 16 Kms. from Tendukheda and around 65 Kms. from Damoh at Damoh Jabalpur State Highway.
- You can see many jungle spots and wild animals at Nauradehi abhyaranya. Nauradehi Abhyaranya 25 Kms. from Tendukheda to Sagar Road.

This is the very big teerthkshetra of Jain temples, There are around 65 old temples at hills of Kundalpur. Shree Bade baba murti is very beautiful in bade baba mandir.
Shree Bade baba mandir is under construction.
